layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x576
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x40

                text run at (707,0) width 37: "Home"

          text run at (0,0) width 512: "This test case illustrates the correct positioning of list item bullets according to CSS3. "
          text run at (512,0) width 265: "The bullets should be on the far left, with the"
          text run at (0,20) width 210: "text of the list items on the far right."
